Francesco Solera
Roger Zou

dcterms:description: The DukeMTMC-reID dataset contains 1,812 identities with 36,411 images captured by eight cameras, which splits 702 identities with 16,522 images for training and the remaining images for testing.
dcterms:title: DukeMTMC-reID

dcterms:creator: Liang Zheng
Liyue Shen
Lu Tian
Shengjin Wang
Jingdong Wang
Qi Tian
dcterms:description: The Market-1501 dataset consists of 32,688 images of 1,501 identities captured by six cameras, where the training set contains 12,936 images of 751 identities, and the test set contains 19,732 images of 750 identities.
dcterms:title: Market-1501

dcterms:creator: Longhui Wei
Shiliang Zhang
Wen Gao
Qi Tian
dcterms:description: The MSMT17 dataset is a large-scale person re-ID dataset, which consists of 126,441 bounding boxes of 4,101 identities captured by fifteen cameras, for which 32,621 images of 1,041 identities are used for training.
dcterms:title: MSMT17

dcterms:creator: Xiaoxiao Sun
Liang Zheng
dcterms:description: PersonX is used as the synthetic source domain for domain adaptation experiments.
dcterms:title: PersonX
